detaileddescription.para: Callback called during upload or download of a file from server It is just forwarding the call and some parameters to the vtable defined callback

memberdef.name: sephone_chat_message_file_transfer_on_send_body

detaileddescription.para: Callback called when posting a file to server (following rcs5.1 recommendation)

parameterdescription.para: the user data associated to the handler, contains the sephoneChatMessage we're working on
current position in the input buffer
the ouput buffer we to copy the data to be uploaded
size in byte of the data requested, as output it will contain the effective copied size

detaileddescription.para: Callback function called when we have a response from server during a file upload to server (rcs5.1 recommandation) Note: The first post is empty and the server shall reply a 204 (No content) message, this will trigger a new post request to the server to upoad the file. The server response to this second post is processed by this same function

parameterdescription.para: the user define pointer associated with the request, it contains the sephoneChatMessage we're trying to send

detaileddescription.para: Destroys a SephoneChatMessage.

Inconditionnaly disable incoming chat messages.

Enable reception of incoming chat messages. By default it is enabled but it can be disabled with sephone_core_disable_chat().

detaileddescription.para:
Create a message attached to a dedicated chat room;
cr
the chat room.
message
text message, NULL if absent.
external_body_url
the URL given in external body or NULL.
state
the SephoneChatMessage.State of the message.
time
the time_t at which the message has been received/sent.
is_read
TRUE if the message should be flagged as read, FALSE otherwise.
is_incoming
TRUE if the message has been received, FALSE otherwise.
a new SephoneChatMessage

Send a message to peer member of this chat room.

SephoneChatRoom object
msg
SephoneChatMessage message to be sent
status_cb
SephoneChatMessageStateChangeCb status callback invoked when message is delivered or could not be delivered. May be NULL
ud
user data for the status cb.
Deprecated
Use sephone_chat_room_send_chat_message() instead.
The SephoneChatMessage must not be destroyed until the the callback is called.

Send a message to peer member of this chat room.
cr
SephoneChatRoom object
msg
SephoneChatMessage object The state of the message sending will be notified via the callbacks defined in the SephoneChatMessageCbs object that can be obtained by calling sephone_chat_message_get_callbacks().
